name: Columbia Group
title: Maritime AI Factory Under New Head of AI

classification.classificationRationale: Decision tree: Formal AI unit=YES (Head of AI role, 'AI factory' concept) → Publishes research=NO → Central team=YES → Builds or enables=ENABLES (productivity tools, knowledge management, crew assignment) → M2 Center of Excellence. Low confidence: single source, thin data. The 'AI factory' concept could evolve toward M4 or M5 but current evidence shows an enablement function.

description: Columbia Group, a Cyprus-based maritime company, appointed Christina Orfanidou as Head of AI in February 2026. Orfanidou previously served as Head of AI Services at Deloitte Cyprus and led AI adoption for the European Commission. She plans to establish an 'AI factory' for developing customized solutions, with initial focus on internal operations: AI agents for repetitive tasks, knowledge management tools, and modernized crew assignment systems. The appointment illustrates the diffusion of AI leadership roles into traditional maritime industries.
